body: What the..?Are you shitting me now?...ALMOST EVERY FUCKIN TANK,STORY,DOUJIN SOMEONE SHIT OUT TO THIS FUCKING SITE IS FUCKING NTRASH.WHAT THE FUCK IS WRONG WITH YOU PEOPLE?
@MandoTheRando thanks for the heads up, will looking forward to this series.
it was kinda wholesome until she turned horny af
this work has mix stories of vanilla and netorare so both sides can enjoy this ( i think? ) (^_^')

For the people who know Tanaka Aji's previous works, yes this is going to lead to Netorare but not of the two girls on the cover. Main dude is gonna get these two girls and keep em. There will however be a bunch of interconnecting stories that do involve Netorare though, so....NTR fans can look forward to that I guess
